channel.title: New Datmaker Website!
channel.description:
Sorry about the lastsite being down the domain got deleted :( so no i bought a new one and better webhosting here you u go :) its a little better set up now including:
[LIST=1] [*]Easier to Read [*]faster (better web host) [*]links to the other tutorials from the side panel [*]blog ( more on this later ) [*] soon to be stuff for rs Poser [*]the tutorials include: Using Datmaker 1.3 , Using datamker f orsimple models , Finalizing your model for inserting animation data. , Inserting Anim data using Metasequoia. [*]Download links to Datmaker and metasequoia and soon Examples models ;) [/list]
[IMG]http://dragonscape.info/datmaker/datmaker.jpg[/img]
Left panel:-
Starting from the top, we have a refresh button. This refreshes the directory listing for the current directory.
Then we have the directory listing itself.
Then we have 5 checkboxes, fill, edges, points, grid, and axis. These enable/disable the displaying of these items withing the 3D window.
The Cull faces checkbox enables/disables backface culling. Disable this when inspecting your model.
Bkg and Edge color boxes - these allow you to change the color of the background and edge color within the 3D window.
Dropdown menu - For Model veriosn 3 only. This menu allows you to select very basic anim data to be included in your model. The only really useful items are head objects(hats), left hand(shields), right hand(standard weapons(swords) and gloves(daggers,axes,gloves).
Use Blank PRI checkbox - For model version 3 only. This allows you to insert blank priority numbers into the dat file.(limited usefulnedd - for advanced modellers).
Edit box - this allows you manually set the priority flag. Very important function for all simple models. The number next to the box is to indicate the val.... for the rest go [URL=http://"http://dragonscape.info/rsdatmaker/Using-Datmaker-1-3.php"]HERE[/URL]
[URL=http://datmaker.dragonscape.info/index.php]http://datmaker.dragonscape.info/index.php[/URL]
Dont forget to sign the guest book!

item.title: New Datmaker Website!
item.dc:creator: @dragmagic dragmagic
item.description:
@dragmagic wrote:

well iv used blender b4 but i didnt like it ummm i would not know where to look i will give u the exact name and maybe u can find it on blender “smooth shading” is what it is called so find it on blender and uncheck it or how ever it is

Read full topic

item.title: New Datmaker Website!
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“dragmagic, post:4, topic:303498”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=399822.msg2965202#msg2965202 date=1253504599]
nice, i only wish datmaker didnt distort the model, which ive noticed it does. guess that cant be helped though.
[/quote]

attually it doesnt :s i can show u how to make it so u can see the true model in meta its a setting the setting is set to smooth the surfaces but that is only on meta so if u remoe that u will see the true model ;)[/quote]
alright, and how would i do that? i havent messed with meta since i started blender so im useless on meta =S

Read full topic

item.title: New Datmaker Website!
item.dc:creator: @dragmagic dragmagic
item.description:
@dragmagic wrote:

dylan_0789:

nice, i only wish datmaker didnt distort the model, which ive noticed it does. guess that cant be helped though.

attually it doesnt :s i can show u how to make it so u can see the true model in meta its a setting the setting is set to smooth the surfaces but that is only on meta so if u remoe that u will see the true model
